name: dapr
description: Comprehensive DAPR development plugin for Python microservices with full Azure integration. Covers all 12 DAPR building blocks plus DAPR Agents AI framework. Features: state management, pub/sub, service invocation, actors, workflows, bindings, secrets, configuration, distributed lock, cryptography, jobs, conversation (LLM), AI agents, agentic patterns, multi-agent orchestration, CrewAI and OpenAI Agents integrations. Includes testing support, CI/CD integration, observability, and security scanning.
